titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: The Luzerne County Bible Society was organized in 1853 to promote the circulation of the Holy Scriptures, in the common version, "without note or comment."

scopecontent.p: This is a volume of minutes of the Executive Committee of the Luzerne County Bible Society, 1853-1878. The minutes include the Society's constitution, treasurer's reports, reports from annual meetings, and newspaper clippings with statistics and quotations from people who had received bibles. The minutes also include detailed visitation reports which include statistics on bibles delivered and financial accounts.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
